The weather appears overcast or rainy, as indicated by the active windshield wipers and wet road surface. As the vehicle approaches a pedestrian crossing, a person on a bicycle or scooter suddenly emerges from behind a line of parked cars on the right side of the road, darting directly into the vehicle's path. The vehicle rapidly decelerates to avoid a collision, allowing the person to cross safely. Other vehicles are present on both sides of the road, and tall buildings line the street.
